reviews.review: Over all CSGO is actually quite fun and enjoyable but I hate those cheaters but overall, its a thumbs up.

It is the best free fps game out there! Would really recommend this game to anybody who just wants to sit and play fps with friends on PC!

This game is really fun and is a great place to blow off some steam atleast for me. its just a decent shooter and takes me back to the days of black ops 2 S&D lobbies

Such an old game, yet it's still broken and being "updated" and changed as if it was some pre alpha game. All about money with the skins for the kids.

Edit: steam asks me to review the game, again xD Sooo here i am. Trash is still broken ;) They're still making millions ;)
don't, the game is shit, the people are worse. Spare yourself. I've Played for sever additional hours, still dog shit.
gosto muito do jogo pois adoro jogo de tiro jogo dez de 2015
Mesmo anos após seu lançamento continua sendo um dos melhores FPS da atualidade.

Una genial evolución del la versión 1.6, los gráficos son mejores pero lo suficientemente amigables para que el juego funcione bien sin necesidad de tener altos niveles de tarjeta de vídeo u otros. El juego necesario para todos los amantes del FPS.
